name: unweathered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not changed by the effects of sun, wind, or other weather conditions: The scientists removed the outer layer of the rock to reveal a fresh, unweathered surface. These crystals are shiny and transparent when they are unweathered. Opposite
weathered
More examplesFewer examplesThe building has a slate roof with bright unweathered tiles.The outside of the building has a solid and unweathered look.Considering his age, his face remains remarkably unweathered.The rocks are relatively unweathered and so they must have been formed quite recently.
